values.value: Please specify dose, duration and results of trial with methylphenidate IR/SR (ie. Ritalin-type methylphenidate) or dexamphetamine IR/SR, OR provide rationale to avoid trial. Please note, Previous trials of methylphenidate ER (eg. Concerta, Biphentin, Foquest) or long-acting amphetamines (eg. Adderall, Vyvanse) are not accepted as an alternative.
